name: Rebecca
text:
[Blocker]
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Dressrosa} type Stage card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order and play up to 1 {Dressrosa} type Stage card with a cost of 1 from your hand.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Dressrosa} type Stage card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order and play up to 1 {Dressrosa} type Stage card with a cost of 1 from your hand.
